text: Ðis synd þa landgemær into Widiandune.
Ærest of anna forda innan tilnoþ andlang tilnoþes to waclescumbe.
Betweoh wacles cumbe & ealdan slæde innan mænanlea.
Fram mænanlea on horsweg.
Of horswege innan gatanstige, þanon innon denebroc.
Of denebroce innon tilnoþ andlong tilnoþes to halgan wyllan.
Of þære wyllan in hreodcumb ðanon in þa mærdic andlang þære dic to cnictes ferwege.
Of þam wege on ealdan stanwege, of stanwege on posecumbes heafdon.
And swa on suð healf þæs mores to wohan æc.
From þære æc þurh þone sceagan on flod leah þanon on beamweg.
From þam weg on buccan slæd & swa eft on beanweg.
Andlang ðæs weges to colesburnan forda, from þam forda innon cyrnea.
Andlang ea to mærcumbe, lang cumbes to lind ofres heafdan.
And swa to þam fulan wege to nataleahes æsce, fram þam æsce to duddan heale.
Fram þam heale andlang mærweges to byrcsies heale, & swa to pican stapele.
Of þam stapule in catteshlinc, fram þam hlince innan mærbroc.
Andlang broces to mærforda, of þam forda to sceapan æcge.
And swa on þone grenanweg, andlang weges to weallehes wege.
And þanon on stanihtan weg to alre wyllan, of alre wyllan to þære ealdan dic.
Andlang dic ofer huniburnan in þa oþre ealdan dic.
And swa in þone mylen pol, of þam pole to þære port stræte.
Andlang stræte to þam þorne on annandune.
Of þære dune into annan crundele, & swa æfter stræte in annanford.
